about_the_game:
2D Tool Kit allows you to import 2D images in PNG and JPG formats, such that you can use your own drawings and images in the 3D scenes. It also comes with a few sets of 2D image libraries (such as speed lines etc.) that helps speed up your comic production.

NEW: Added 2D drawing tools.

This package also provides you 2 browser tools:
- Reference image browser - allows you display an image of your own on a window panel, this is useful when you need a reference to build your scene.
- Internal internet browser - you also can search for references, wiki, and just about anything you can do with the browser. And yes, you can play YouTube with it too.
